thread.title: Firearm violations

author: kkennedy@timesonline.com (Kirstin Kennedy)
title: Firearm violations
text: 0 Stephanie M. Barnhart, 27, of 362 Linmar Terrace, Aliquippa, at 5:03 p.m. Oct. 10 in the 200 block of Linmar Terrace, Aliquippa. According to a police report, Barnhart carried a firearm through a residential area. Police also said she is not allowed to carry a gun due to a previous criminal conviction. Barnhart has been charged by Aliquippa police with illegal possession of a firearm, reckless endangerment and disorderly conduct. Elizabeth M. Bialowas, 25, of 612 Lincoln St., East Rochester, March 24 at John Brown's Armory, 190 Brighton Ave., Rochester. According to a police report, Bialowas attempted to buy a firearm despite being prohibited from doing so. She was charged by state police with making a false statement and lying under penalty. Tags
